reviews.reviewContent: This was needed today. In these chaotic times, it's easy to fight against everything happening because it doesn't fit my plan. Sometimes I need to remember that my plan isn't the only plan.
Such tremendous release. I will surrender and trust the process. Thank you 🙏🏽 🙏🏽

You hit the nail on the head.  Now, how do we accomplish this?  My life is very pleasant and I meditate every morning yet each trip to a doctor and my blood pressure skyrockets?  I breathe and relax yet I'm not successful in calming myself.  Any ideas?  Thank you.
Rahmat. Yaxshi meditatsiya.
Serene and calm, I barely felt my mind drift on this one. Perfect meditation to relax for the upcoming day.
Beautiful, relaxing.....sends me into a peaceful sleep every time.  Thank you.
잠이 솔솔 오는 명상입니다. 한국어로 써서 미안합니다. 땡큐!
Just what my soul was asking for. 피쓰
Somehow emotional for me. Don’t know where it came from, but somewhere deep.

Wonderful!!  Thank you, thank you. 
Namaste!
Love this piece. The perfect accompaniment to the sunset.
I’m refreshed and restored to calm. Centered and grateful to you for sharing your God given talent with the world. Love God, love people!

Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
You restored my soul and gave me hope.
This is a marvelous meditation and I thank you from the bottom of my heart for having shared it with us all.
May your life be filled with blessings.
🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻
I feel whole and at perfect peace after this. Amazing
The best meditation that I've ever had.
Thank you for helping me refocus.
Excellent to have this perspective! 🙏
Wonderfully handy toolbox to assist in our social anxiety.
Thank you very much for putting together this amazing material. It help me a lot in getting understanding and ease 👏🏼👏🏼
I loved this course. Great presentation, and evidence-based tips and suggestions. Really practical and helpful.
Спасибо. хорошая медитация!
Thank you so much for this course , i love the tools so much .. You gave me hope and resource  to overcome my anxiety .So much grateful
Amazing, it helps me a lot Thank you so much 🙏
Very helpful advice. I really need it.
I love your voice. Thank you for your wonderful meditations 🙏
The most wonderful balance of sound and words thank you
I fall asleep about 99.9% of the time
شكرا لك. تأمل جيد جدا.
Extremamente relaxante. Não durmo sem ouvir pois o sono Não é o mesmo.
Gracias. Tan buena meditación.
